author: Stephanie Ebbs
title: Does air pollution increase risk from COVID-19? Here's what we know
description: Harvard researchers recently found that increased exposure to air pollution can lead to more severe outcomes from COVID-19.
content:
A newly released study from researchers at Harvard University has brought more attention to the impact pollution in the air can have on patients who contract the novel coronavirus
The study connected exposure to high levels of air pollution to higher rates o… [+7784 chars]
